Biopic based on the experiences of real-life Iraq conflict veteran Chris Kyle, directed by Clint Eastwood and starring Bradley Cooper, Sienna Miller and Kyle Gallner.

programme.title: The Silence of the Lambs
programme.desc: Trainee FBI agent Clarice Starling is sent to interview an imprisoned psychopath with a taste for eating his victims. The inmate offers to help catch a serial killer who is holding a politician's daughter hostage - but to learn what he knows, Clarice has to engage in his dangerous mind games. Jonathan Demme's Oscar-winning thriller, based on Thomas Harris's novel, starring Jodie Foster, Anthony Hopkins, Scott Glenn and Ted Levine.

programme.title: The Birds
programme.desc: A San Francisco socialite takes a shine to a man she meets by chance, and follows him home to a Californian coastal community. Her arrival coincides with a series of mysterious attacks on people by birds, which soon escalates as vast flocks go on the warpath. Alfred Hitchcock's thriller, based on a Daphne du Maurier short story, starring Tippi Hedren, Rod Taylor, Suzanne Pleshette, Jessica Tandy and Veronica Cartwright.(n)

programme.title: Thunderbolt and Lightfoot
programme.desc: Retired bank robber John Doherty escapes a gunman with the aid of a young car thief, and together they go in search of the loot from the former crook's last job. When they discover the stash is missing - and John's thuggish old partners are also looking for it - the pair decide to do a repeat robbery. Comedy drama, starring Clint Eastwood, Jeff Bridges, George Kennedy and Geoffrey Lewis.(n)

programme.title: Rawhide
programme.desc: Outlaws hold staff and a passenger and her baby hostage at a remote stagecoach station while awaiting the arrival of a shipment of $100,000 in gold bullion. The nervous captives try to stay calm, but the tension between the gang leader and a jumpy henchman grows fraught, ending in a frantic shoot-out - with the infant in the thick of the fray. Western, starring Tyrone Power, Susan Hayward and Jack Elam.(n)

programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: A US congressman gets embroiled in a secret mission to provide covert military support to rebels in Soviet-occupied Afghanistan. Before long, he finds unlikely allies in the shape of a womanising CIA agent, a Texan socialite and the president of Pakistan. Fact-based political drama set during the 1980s, starring Tom Hanks, Julia Roberts and Philip Seymour Hoffman.(n)

programme.title: True Story
programme.desc: A disgraced New York Times reporter discovers that an accused killer has assumed his identity, and the resulting investigation turns into a game of cat and mouse. Fact-based drama, starring Jonah Hill, James Franco and Felicity Jones.(n)

programme.title: Beyond the Sea
programme.desc: Musical biopic of singer Bobby Darin, exploring his formative years, during which he develops his love of music, his subsequent success as a rock 'n' roller and a lounge singer, and his struggle to maintain popularity during the 1960s. Kevin Spacey directs and stars, alongside Bob Hoskins, John Goodman and Kate Bosworth.(n)

programme.title: Get On Up
programme.desc: Biopic of James Brown, examining key moments in the soul singer's life, from his impoverished childhood in South Carolina to his rise to become one of the most influential figures in music history, and following his intense friendship with fellow singer Bobby Byrd. Starring Chadwick Boseman, Viola Davis, Nelsan Ellis and Octavia Spencer.(n)

programme.title: Amadeus: The Director's Cut
programme.desc: Composer Antonio Salieri is a favoured artist in the court of Austrian emperor Joseph II, but he finds himself pushed aside in favour of a young Mozart. Salieri admires the younger maestro's music, but is incensed that someone so vulgar and obnoxious should be gifted with such talent, and as jealousy consumes him, he plots his rival's downfall. Extended cut of Milos Forman's period drama, adapted by Peter Shaffer from his own play and starring F Murray Abraham and Tom Hulce.(n)

programme.title: Love & Mercy
programme.desc: Biopic of the Beach Boys' Brian Wilson, following the singer-songwriter at two periods in his life. In the 1960s, he is at his creative peak, but haunted by inner demons that take their toll on his mental health. By the 1980s, he is a broken man dominated by a shady doctor, until a new relationship offers him a chance at recovery. Starring John Cusack, Paul Dano, Paul Giamatti and Elizabeth Banks.(n)

programme.title: Straight Outta Compton
programme.desc: Biopic of hip hop group NWA, examining their rise to fame in the 1980s. The five members of the group drew inspiration from their anger at the dangerous world they saw around them, producing hard-hitting songs about urban life that redefined a musical genre. Starring O'Shea Jackson Jr, Corey Hawkins, Jason Mitchell, Neil Brown Jr and Aldis Hodge.(n)

programme.title: The Commitments
programme.desc: A would-be music producer from Dublin believes he can make it big in Ireland by promoting a top-rate soul band, so he trawls a working-class neighbourhood and auditions unlikely singers and musicians to put together as a group. Alan Parker's urban comedy, based on the novel by Roddy Doyle, starring Robert Arkins, Andrew Strong, Michael Aherne, Angeline Ball and Maria Doyle Kennedy.(n)

programme.title: Your Highness
programme.desc: Dashing Prince Fabious is the greatest hero in the kingdom, while his younger brother Thadeous is a lazy, self-centred fool. When the princess whom Fabious is due to marry is kidnapped by an evil wizard, the two brothers must go on a dangerous quest to rescue her, with a little help from a vengeful warrior woman. Fantasy comedy, with Danny McBride, James Franco and Natalie Portman.

programme.title: Lifeboat
programme.desc: The survivors of a torpedoed passenger ship are set adrift in a lifeboat. As they pull out other survivors from the sea, they realise one of them is the U-boat commander responsible for the disaster. Alfred Hitchcock's Second World War drama, starring Tallulah Bankhead, Walter Slezak, William Bendix, Hume Cronyn and Henry Hull.

programme.title: Lemony Snicket's A Series of Unfortunate Events
programme.desc: Three orphans are entrusted into the care of their sinister uncle, a master of disguise who intends to kill them for the family fortune. Quickly realising he is up to no good, the children flee, moving from one prospective guardian to the next - but their wily relative is never far behind. Comedy adventure based on the children's books, starring Jim Carrey, Meryl Streep, Jude Law, Liam Aitken and Emily Browning, with Kara and Shelby Hoffman.

programme.title: Percy Jackson & the Lightning Thief
programme.desc: A teenager is shocked to discover he is the son of Greek god Poseidon and has been accused of stealing Zeus's lightning bolt. The youngster is given 14 days to find the culprit and return the missing item before the furious deity instigates an apocalyptic war. Fantasy adventure, starring Logan Lerman, Pierce Brosnan, Brandon T Jackson, Alexandra Daddario, Jake Abel, Sean Bean and Steve Coogan.

programme.title: Percy Jackson: Sea of Monsters
programme.desc: The modern-day teenage son of the Greek god Poseidon must lead his friends on a perilous journey into the Bermuda triangle. They need to recover the legendary Golden Fleece to save the world, but getting to it means braving all manner of terrifying monsters. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Logan Lerman and Alexandra Daddario.

programme.title: Airplane
programme.desc: The passengers on board an ill-fated airliner become increasingly jittery when the flight crew flounder during a food-poisoning crisis. As ground control personnel struggle heroically to ensure the plane lands safely, a traumatised war veteran must face his fear to take the controls. Spoof disaster movie, starring Robert Hays, Leslie Nielsen, Robert Stack and Lloyd Bridges.

programme.title: Bridesmaids
programme.desc: A disorganised woman is asked to be maid of honour at her best friend's wedding. Taking charge of the prenuptial bridal celebrations, she resolves to give her pal and accompanying bridesmaids the time of their lives, but as her efforts slide into chaos she finds the wife of the groom's boss is keen to usurp her position. Comedy, with Kristen Wiig, Rose Byrne and Melissa McCarthy.

programme.title: Magic Mike
programme.desc: A male stripper who is the star attraction in a nightclub teaches a talented young dancer the tricks of the trade, while also introducing him to his hedonistic world. The veteran performer falls for his protege's sister, but finds his wild lifestyle comes between them. Steven Soderbergh's comedy drama, with Channing Tatum, Matthew McConaughey, Olivia Munn and Alex Pettyfer.

programme.title: The Squad
programme.desc: Contact is lost with a remote military base in Colombia's high-plains moors. Nine soldiers are sent to investigate, finding the outpost deserted except for a captive woman who does not speak. The isolation and the sinister surroundings spread paranoia among the men, who begin to turn against each other. Horror, starring Juan David Restrepo and Andres Castaneda. In Spanish.(n)

programme.title: The Bedford Incident
programme.desc: The ruthless captain of a US destroyer develops an obsession with tracking down a Russian submarine. As he drives his men harder, he fails to anticipate the consequences of his actions - leading to a fatal mistake. Cold War thriller, starring Richard Widmark, Sidney Poitier, Martin Balsam, Wally Cox, Eric Portman and Donald Sutherland.(n)

programme.title: Ice Age: Dawn of the Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Sid the sloth discovers three eggs - but when they hatch into dinosaurs, he struggles to keep them under control. The creatures' mother comes looking for her offspring and takes them and Sid to an underground world where the giant reptiles never became extinct. Sid's friends, aided by a crazed one-eyed weasel, head for this strange new land to rescue him. Animated adventure sequel, with the voices of John Leguizamo, Denis Leary, Ray Romano and Simon Pegg.(n)

programme.title: Ice Age: Continental Drift
programme.desc: A cataclysm leaves prehistoric animals Manny, Sid and Diego lost at sea on a drifting iceberg. They try to find a way to return home, embarking on a journey that leads to an encounter with a ferocious band of piratical creatures. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Ray Romano, John Leguizamo, Denis Leary and Peter Dinklage.(n)

programme.title: Imagine That
programme.desc: A financial executive finds his once successful career beginning to fall apart. He finds solutions to his problems when he enters the imaginary world created by his daughter - but the experience also makes him rethink whether the benefits of his job outweigh the drawbacks. Fantasy comedy, with Eddie Murphy, Yara Shahidi, Thomas Haden Church and Martin Sheen.(n)

programme.title: St Trinian's 2: The Legend of Fritton's Gold
programme.desc: The mischievous schoolgirls embark on a hunt for buried treasure after learning their headmistress Miss Fritton is a descendant of pirates. However, they face competition in the form of a dastardly lord eager to locate the loot for himself. Comedy sequel, starring Rupert Everett, Gemma Arterton, Colin Firth, David Tennant and Talulah Riley.(n)

programme.title: Identity Thief
programme.desc: A con-woman acquires an executive's credit card numbers, and lives a life of luxury at his expense. The outraged victim sets out on a mission to track down the fraudster and bring her to justice personally - resulting in them travelling on a disastrous road trip across America together. Comedy, with Jason Bateman, Melissa McCarthy, Jon Favreau and Amanda Peet.(n)

programme.title: Mindscape
programme.desc: A psychic with the ability to explore people's memories uses his talents to aid the police, until a case goes disastrously wrong. Desperate for work, he agrees to help a wealthy couple discover why their teenage daughter is on a hunger strike, but beings to fear she is manipulating her memories to deceive him. Fantasy thriller, starring Mark Strong, Taissa Farmiga and Brian Cox.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Two Native Americans arrive in town and claim the mountain as their ancestral land, with the Waltons barn standing on an ancient burial ground.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: The family help fix up the Baldwin sisters' seaside cottage, where they meet an English girl with a troubled past.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Part one of two. Charles returns to Walnut Grove with son Albert in an attempt to steer him away from the influence of bad company.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Part two of two. The truth about Albert's anger and contempt toward the world is revealed as Charles brings him back to Walnut Grove to help cure his morphine addiction.

programme.title: I'll Be Home for Christmas
programme.desc: A couple in a small New England town during the Second World War await the return of their two sons and daughter for Christmas. Drama, starring Hal Holbrook, Eva Marie Saint, Jason Oliver, Courteney Cox, Peter Gallagher and Nancy Travis.

programme.title: Jacqueline Bouvier Kennedy
programme.desc: The second in a two-part mini-series exploring the life of the First Lady, from her years as a photojournalist to her husband's election as President. Starring Jaclyn Smith and James Franciscus.

programme.title: Mayflower Madam
programme.desc: Fact-based drama based on the life of former debutante Sydney Biddle Barrows, a descendent of the Mayflower pilgrims, who became notorious as the proprietor of a high-class New York escort agency. Candice Bergen, Chris Sarandon and Chita Rivera star.

programme.title: Breach of Trust
programme.desc: A woman is devastated to learn a plane on which her husband was travelling has crashed, leaving him in a coma. However, the disaster leads to the revelation that he has been conducting a secret relationship with another woman, who did not survive the crash. What's more, they had a daughter. Drama, starring Roma Downey, William Russ and Jamie Rose.

programme.title: To Live For
programme.desc: A terminally ill woman's last months are made happier by her relationship with a stranger she hopes will take care of her children. Romantic drama, starring Nancy Travis, Scott Bairstow, Jamie Renee Smith, Karen James and Viveka Davis.

programme.title: Mistaken Identity
programme.desc: A mix-up in a maternity ward results in two new mothers unwittingly taking home the wrong babies - leaving them to face a terrible dilemma once the truth comes to light. Drama based on a true story, starring Melissa Gilbert, Rosanna Arquette, David Andrews and James McCaffrey.

programme.title: One Against the Wind
programme.desc: Biopic of Second World War heroine Mary Lindell, who helped freedom fighters and members of the Allied forces escape the clutches of the Nazis in occupied France. Starring Judy Davis, Sam Neill, Denholm Elliot and Kate Beckinsale.

programme.title: A Touch of Hope
programme.desc: A man discovers he has the abilities of a faith healer. Initially reluctant, he agrees to use his gift to help doctors, but only in emergency cases. However, many in the medical community are suspicious of his claims, a conflict that comes to a head when he is asked to bring a doubting doctor's daughter out of a coma. Fact-based drama, starring Anthony Michael Hall, CCH Pounder, Abraham Benrubi and Fay Masterson.

programme.title: The Promise
programme.desc: A battered wife with three children is persuaded by her sister to leave her abusive husband, but he continues to subject her to a barrage of harassment and threats - until the situation culminates in a fatal confrontation that changes the lives of all involved. Drama, starring Isabella Hofmann, Seth Adkins, Tracy Nelson and Matt Cooke.

programme.title: Ambush in Waco
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about the life of American religious leader David Koresh, whose belief in his own divinity eventually led to a violent and tragic confrontation with the authorities. Starring Timothy Daly and Dan Lauria.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Erin turns down her boyfriend's marriage proposal, so he enlists in the army.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Part one of two. Mary Ellen prepares to give birth, and Jason encounters financial difficulties that force him to look for work elsewhere.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Laura holds Doc Baker responsible for her son's death, causing the rest of the town to reject him.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Sarah Carter is jealous when her son Jason makes friends with lonely newcomer Ruthy Leland. Vera Miles guest stars.(n)

programme.title: A Father's Betrayal
programme.desc: A respected senior attorney faces accusations of rape against a friend of his son, who is also a lawyer, leading to professional and personal conflicts in the family as his nearest and dearest are caught up in the controversial case. Drama, directed by and starring Brian Dennehy, with Lynn Redgrave, Reed Diamond, Alice Krige and Michael David Simms.(n)

programme.title: Chasing Secrets
programme.desc: An abused youngster suffers at the hands of her uncaring grandparents, until she is taken under the wing of an elderly couple - who struggle to help her lay the ghosts of the past to rest. Drama, starring Della Reese, Ossie Davis and Crystal Bernhard.(n)

programme.title: Video Voyeur: The Susan Wilson Story
programme.desc: A woman is understandably horrified to discover her apparently kind-hearted neighbour has somehow managed to install state-of-the-art surveillance equipment throughout her home, so he can spy on her and her family. Fact-based drama, starring Angie Harmon, Jamey Sheridan and Dale Midkiff.(n)

programme.title: The Babysitter's Seduction
programme.desc: When the wife of her wealthy employer is found dead, unsuspecting babysitter Michelle is drawn into a sinister plot and finds herself being accused of murder by a determined detective. Thriller, starring Keri Russell, Stephen Collins, Phylicia Rashad and Tobin Bell.(n)

programme.title: Meat Loaf: To Hell and Back
programme.desc: Biopic charting the rocker's early years and how he overcame his bullying father and a lifelong weight problem to achieve international fame. W Earl Brown, Dedee Pfeiffer and Zachary Throne star.(n)

programme.title: Blue Valley Songbird
programme.desc: A talented singer-songwriter's love of country music provides her with a means of escaping the clutches of her abusive manager-boyfriend and starting a new life. Drama, starring Dolly Parton, John Terry, Billy Dean and Kimberley Kates.(n)

programme.title: In His Life: The John Lennon Story
programme.desc: Biopic of the singer who formed one half of the most successful and celebrated songwriting partnership of modern times. The film charts the musician's youth in Liverpool and his rise to fame with the Beatles, a group which redefined popular music during the 1960s, before recalling his solo career and tragic death outside his home in Manhattan. Starring Philip McQuillan, Blair Brown, Daniel McGowan and Jamie Glover.(n)

programme.title: Birth of the Beatles
programme.desc: Pop biopic charting the Beatles' early days in Germany with original members Pete Best and Stu Sutcliffe, and their first stab at chart success with Ringo Starr and producer George Martin. Starring Stephen Mackenna, John Altman, Rod Culbertson, Ray Ashcroft and Nigel Havers.(n)

programme.title: Hendrix
programme.desc: Biopic of the legendary guitarist who changed the face of music during the 1960s. Starring Wood Harris, Vivica A Fox, Dorian Harewood and Billy Zane.(n)

programme.title: In the Line of Duty: Street War
programme.desc: A cop is left devastated and grief-stricken after his partner is murdered in cold blood - and sets out to exact revenge on the villains responsible for the crime. Thriller, starring Ray Sharkey, Peter Boyle and Courtney B Vance.(n)

programme.title: Mayflower Madam
programme.desc: Fact-based drama based on the life of former debutante Sydney Biddle Barrows, a descendent of the Mayflower pilgrims, who became notorious as the proprietor of a high-class New York escort agency. Candice Bergen, Chris Sarandon and Chita Rivera star.

programme.title: Taming Andrew
programme.desc: A mother is distraught when her son is abducted and spends the next five years searching for him, only to suffer more pain when they are finally reunited and she discovers the emotional trauma he has endured. Fact-based drama, starring Park Overall, Jason Beghe and Seth Adkins.

programme.title: Before He Wakes
programme.desc: Fact-based thriller about a greedy woman who marries and murders two wealthy husbands in succession, to acquire their fortunes, and almost succeeds in getting away scot-free. Starring Jaclyn Smith, Diana Scarwid, Hope Lange and Timothy Carhart.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: After finding himself unable to shoot a turkey while on a hunting trip, John-Boy displays his courage by saving his father's life.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Budding author John-Boy secretly borrows a typewriter to further his career, but sister Mary Ellen causes him no end of trouble by selling it to the local junk collector. Starring Richard Thomas and Judy Norton.

programme.title: Jennifer: A Woman's Story
programme.desc: A shipbuilding magnate dies, and the company's board of directors divides into various factions, each determined to seize full control of the operation. The widow of the dead tycoon is determined to keep the business in the family, and battles against various schemes to take it from her. Drama, starring Elizabeth Montgomery and Bradford Dillman.

programme.title: Great Escape 2: The Untold Story
programme.desc: Part two of two. A daring army major returns to Germany to capture the Gestapo officer who ordered the massacre of 50 of his men. Second World War drama, starring Christopher Reeve.

programme.title: A Child's Wish
programme.desc: A distressed man takes time off work to help look after his cancer-stricken daughter, only to be fired by his uncaring boss, prompting the start of a long legal battle which even attracts the President's attention. Fact-based drama, starring John Ritter, Tess Harper, Anna Chlumsky and Bill Clinton as himself.

programme.title: Thicker Than Blood
programme.desc: A man's agonising courtroom battle to gain custody of his son is dealt a crippling blow by the discovery that he isn't the youngster's real father after all. Drama, starring Peter Strauss and Rachel Ticotin.

programme.title: One Against the Wind
programme.desc: Biopic of Second World War heroine Mary Lindell, who helped freedom fighters and members of the Allied forces escape the clutches of the Nazis in occupied France. Starring Judy Davis, Sam Neill, Denholm Elliot and Kate Beckinsale.

programme.title: Mama's Gonna Buy You a Mockingbird
programme.desc: A boy struggles to cope with the death of his father as the Christmas season approaches. Drama, starring Sam Aaron and Rosa Anderson-Barker.

programme.title: Against Her Will: The Carrie Buck Story
programme.desc: A woman with learning disabilities is declared unfit to raise her newborn daughter, but goes to court to fight for custody of the child. Drama, starring Marlee Matlin, Melissa Gilbert and Pat Hingle.

programme.title: Deacons for Defence
programme.desc: A black man is pushed too far by the racist abuse and unprovoked violent assaults meted out by white bigots in the 1960s, and organises a defence group to fight back. Fact-based drama, starring Forest Whitaker, Adam Weiner, Jonathan Silverman and Serene Lee.

programme.title: The Judge
programme.desc: Part one of two. A lawyer defends a controversial judge arrested for soliciting, but soon uncovers a sorry tale involving everything from death and police corruption to an over-ambitious prosecutor. Drama, starring Chris Noth, Edward James Olmos, Lolita Davidovich and Charles Durning.(n)

programme.title: Have You Seen My Son
programme.desc: A woman strives to find her sick son after he is kidnapped by her ex-husband. Drama, starring Lisa Hartman Black, William Russ, Jameson Parker, Anne Francis and Scott Hylands.(n)

programme.title: Mistaken Identity
programme.desc: A mix-up in a maternity ward results in two new mothers unwittingly taking home the wrong babies - leaving them to face a terrible dilemma once the truth comes to light. Drama based on a true story, starring Melissa Gilbert, Rosanna Arquette, David Andrews and James McCaffrey.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A meteorite lands in the Baldwin sisters' recipe room, causing quite a stir among the locals who believe it to be a heaven-sent omen of hope.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A minister comes to stay with the Waltons, but his presence soon sparks off all manner of religious ructions.(n)

programme.title: The Disappearing Act
programme.desc: A distraught mother turns detective to find out the truth behind her son's disappearance, concerned he may have met with foul play at the hands of his beautiful but volatile girlfriend. Fact-based drama, starring Patty Duke, Kelly Rowan and Robert Floyd.(n)

programme.title: Quest for Justice
programme.desc: A 1950s newspaper publisher battles for black integration in her hometown, which is divided by racism. Drama, starring Jane Seymour, DW Moffett, Richard Kiley, Lou Walker and Michelle Joyner.(n)

programme.title: A Killing in a Small Town
programme.desc: A Sunday school teacher looking for excitement embarks on an affair with a church-going man, leading to a fatal confrontation with his wife - but as the case goes to trial, she realises the odds are stacked against a jury accepting her plea of self-defence. Fact-based drama, starring Barbara Hershey, Brian Dennehy, John Terry and Lee Garlington.(n)

programme.title: No One Could Protect Her
programme.desc: A woman is raped in her own home, but the police seem powerless to apprehend the attacker. As reports of further sexual assaults in her neighbourhood mount up, all seemingly the work of the same man, she resolves to turn detective and bring him to justice herself. Thriller based on a true story, starring Joanna Kerns, Anthony John Denison and Peter MacNeill.(n)

programme.title: First Do No Harm
programme.desc: A woman decides to seek alternative forms of treatment for her epileptic son after the conventional methods employed by his doctors fail to have an impact on his welbeing. However, she encounters resistance from members of the medical establishment, who seek to take legal action to stop her removing her child from the hospital. Drama, based on a true story, starring Meryl Streep.(n)

programme.title: Wicked Love
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about a woman found in a car boot after an attempt on her life that leaves her in a coma. As her unfaithful husband and his mistress stand trial, a controversy erupts over whether her life support should be switched off. Starring Rebecca Gibney, Vince Colosimo and Maya Stange.(n)

programme.title: The Christmas Choir
programme.desc: A workaholic accountant is forced to reassess his priorities after his devotion to his job costs him his girlfriend. An encounter with a homeless pianist reminds him of his forgotten dream of becoming a musician, so he decides to help the residents of a homeless shelter earn some money by forming a choir. Drama, starring Jason Gedrick and Tyrone Benskin.(n)

programme.title: Stolen Babies
programme.desc: A welfare worker attempts to bring down a woman she believes is running an illegal adoption racket, but finds her efforts constantly thwarted by her adversary's society connections. Fact-based drama, starring Lea Thompson and Mary Tyler Moore.(n)

programme.title: Ray Donovan
programme.sub-title: Little Bill Primm's Big Green Horseshoe
programme.desc: Little Bill Primm's Big Green Horseshoe. An intruder breaks into the Donovan household; Mickey plots a casino heist; Bridget celebrates her 18th birthday and struggles to maintain her independence; Ray visits Belikov in prison to strike a deal; Bunchy and Teresa navigate their marital woes under lockdown(n)

programme.title: The Circus: Inside The Greatest Political Show on Earth
programme.desc: Game On. Trump and Clinton engage in their own July 4th fireworks, as Clinton's email scandal erupts and Trump backpedals from his latest faux pas(n)

programme.title: Woman in Gold
programme.desc: A Jewish woman attempts to reclaim her family's property, which was stolen six decades earlier during WWII. With the help of an ambitious young lawyer, she starts legal proceedings in various countries around the world(n)

programme.title: SXSW Comedy with Natasha Leggero
programme.desc: Natasha Leggero hosts an all-star lineup of stand-up comics, including Baron Vaughn, Andrew Santino, Emily Heller, James Adomian and Moshe Kasher. Also: a sneak peek at the SXSW festival in Austin, Texas(n)

programme.title: Cas & Dylan
programme.desc: Self-proclaimed loner Dr. Cas Pepper (Richard Dreyfuss) finds himself on the run with an aspiring young writer who hopes to help Cas overcome the writer's block that is preventing him from writing a proper suicide note. Along the way, the unlikely pair discover life has more to teach them both(n)

programme.title: The Alamo
programme.desc: With Dennis Quaid and Billy Bob Thornton in the cast, this historical drama features magnificent war scenes as it reconstructs the revolution over the independence of Texas, in 1836 –before, during and after the construction of the Alamo (a fort built by Spanish missionaries to catechize the natives). Texans and Tejanos (born in Mexico), led by William Travis, Davy Crockett (Thornton) and Jim Bowie, are besieged by an army commanded by Mexican dictator Antonio Lopez de Santa Ana. Later, however, the outcome of the battle of San Jacinto, under General Sam Houston (Dennis Quaid), is the defeat of the Santa Ana men, which finally leads to the independence of the state(n)

programme.title: The Royal Tenenbaums
programme.desc: Director Wes Anderson and his longtime friend and writing partner Owen Wilson follow up Bottle Rocket (1996) and Rushmore (1998) with this similarly offbeat comedy about a dysfunctional family reunion. Royal Tenenbaum (Gene Hackman) was a successful attorney who had three children with his wife Etheline (Anjelica Huston), an archaeologist. Each of the Tenenbaum kids was a precocious genius: Chas (Ben Stiller) made a killing as a child investor. Richie (Luke Wilson) was a junior tennis champ and three-time U.S. Nationals winner. The adopted Margot (Gwyneth Paltrow) was a playwright who won a 50,000-dollar Braverman Grant in the ninth grade. When Royal abruptly left his family, however, it was the beginning of two decades of betrayal and failure that would scar the Tenenbaums for life. Their past resentments are bitterly held against Royal when he suddenly reappears, claiming to have six weeks to live and a desire to reconnect with his family. Typically, Royal's story is a sham, but his presence and sincere desire for absolution soon have a profound effect on the Tenenbaums, who are each dealing with thwarted desires and relationships. Among them are Richie's lifelong love for Margot, who's unhappily married to Raleigh St.Clair (Bill Murray) and Etheline's eccentric engagement to Henry Sherman (Danny Glover), who wishes to marry her. The Royal Tenenbaums also co-stars Owen Wilson and features narration provided by Alec Baldwin(n)

programme.title: Mission: Impossible 2
programme.desc: Action sequel in which a secret agent must capture a rogue colleague who has stolen a deadly genetically engineered virus. With the villain intending to sell the virus and its antidote to the highest bidder, the heroic agent enlists the help of the criminal's former girlfriend. But when the beautiful woman becomes infected, there is a race against time to save her - and the entire human race(n)

programme.title: As I AM: The Life and Times of DJ AM
programme.desc: Profiling DJ AM (aka Adam Goldstein), a hugely successful and influential disc jockey known for his mash-ups of popular songs. This intriguing documentary traces the course of his life as he found fame and fought to remain sober, only to relapse and die of a drug overdose at the age of 36 following the trauma of surviving a plane crash(n)

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: Ultracool thriller crammed with guns and girls, with Samuel L Jackson as cop John Shaft going outside the law to hunt down white collar murderer Christian Bale(n)

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Crockett and Tubbs, two Miami detectives, try to stop a global drug trade, making their job extremely dangerous work(n)

programme.title: Ray Donovan
programme.sub-title: Little Bill Primm's Big Green Horseshoe
programme.desc: Little Bill Primm's Big Green Horseshoe. An intruder breaks into the Donovan household; Mickey plots a casino heist; Bridget celebrates her 18th birthday and struggles to maintain her independence; Ray visits Belikov in prison to strike a deal; Bunchy and Teresa navigate their marital woes under lockdown(n)

programme.title: Shooter
programme.desc: Bob Lee Swagger, es uno de los mejores francotiradores del mundo y el hijo de un reconocido militar que ha ganado la medalla de Honor del Congreso. Es un hombre solitario que viven en las montañas. Él ha abandonado el ejercito tras ser dejado atras en una(n)

programme.title: Roadies
programme.desc: The Bryce Newman Letter. Bryce Newman, a notorious music blogger, pens a scathing post about the band, so Reg invites him to the group's next show to smooth things over. But the crew takes matters into its own hands(n)

programme.title: As I AM: The Life and Times of DJ AM
programme.desc: Profiling DJ AM (aka Adam Goldstein), a hugely successful and influential disc jockey known for his mash-ups of popular songs. This intriguing documentary traces the course of his life as he found fame and fought to remain sober, only to relapse and die of a drug overdose at the age of 36 following the trauma of surviving a plane crash(n)

programme.title: The Hybrid
programme.desc: Elite mercenaries battle both humans and aliens after they discover illegal scientific experiments(n)

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: Annie Wilson's second sight attracts the attention of redneck wife-beater Donnie. But is he really responsible for the murder of promiscuous Jessica? A Southern gothic thriller with a brooding sense of menace(n)

programme.title: Murder in the Dark
programme.desc: A group of campers hunker down in a medieval Turkish town and play a mysterious party game that quickly escalates into something far more sinister(n)

programme.title: Garm Wars: The Last Druid
programme.desc: Three high-tech tribes engage in a deadly war for supremacy and survival on a distant planet(n)

programme.title: Dragonheart
programme.desc: Fantasy adventure about a knight who is determined to rid the land of a tyrant king. Because it was dragon magic that brought the monarch to the throne, the knight is resolved to kill every dragon in the country. Finally, only one dragon remains - but instead of slaying him, the knight and the dragon join forces in an effort to restore a code of truth and honour to the land(n)

programme.title: Ticks
programme.desc: Oversized mutant ticks start terrorizing a nearby campground and eating its campers(n)

programme.title: Awaken
programme.desc: A Russian Special Forces soldier must escape from a mysterious island where people are harvested for their organs and continue on her quest to rescue her sister(n)

programme.title: The Day
programme.desc: A small band of friends make an uneasy alliance with a mysterious lone wolf in this blend of horror and adventure. An unnamed catastrophe has turned the Earth into a wasteland, and as packs of feral cannibals wander the countryside, a dwindling number of survivors struggle to stay alive. Rick (Dominic Monaghan), Adam (Shawn Ashmore), Henson (Cory Hardrict), and Shannon (Shannyn Sossamon) have been journeying together for months and are the last living members of a much larger group. Mary (Ashley Bell) is a solitary woman who crossed paths with the survivors and is now traveling with them. She isn't interested in discussing her past or becoming friends, but the others learn she's a powerful ally in a fight. The travelers take shelter in a house, but are soon surrounded by cannibals; they quickly realize just how strong a warrior Mary can be, while also discovering the terrible truth that led her to wander alone. The Day was directed by Douglas Aarniokoski, who has accumulated extensive credits as an assistant director and helming second-unit material on major films(n)

programme.title: Frank Miller's Sin City: A Dame to Kill For
programme.desc: The follow-up to the comic miniseries adaptation tells Dwight's backstory as he becomes wrapped up in the thralls of femme fatale, Ava. Elsewhere in the seedy city, a mysterious gambler is set on taking down his sworn enemy in a high-stakes game of life and death(n)

programme.title: See No Evil
programme.desc: World Wrestling Entertainment superstar Kane gives a killer performance as a deranged, hulking psychopath who terrorizes eight teens working to rehab a decrepit hotel. It's no-holds-barred mayhem as the murderer employs a variety of different weapons and instruments to dispatch his victims. Directed by Gregory Dark. WWE head Vince McMahon serves as executive producer. Steven Vidler, Christina Vidal, Michael J. Pagan, Samantha Noble, Cecily Polson, Luke Pegler, Penny McNamee, Craig Horner(n)

programme.title: The Last Survivors
programme.desc: An officer mulls sacrificing passengers on an overcrowded lifeboat in order to prevent the vessel from foundering(n)

programme.title: Spring Broke
programme.desc: The raucous history of the infamous spring break revelries in Daytona Beach, Fla., that began in the early 1960s is chronicled

programme.title: One Direction 'Where We Are' Live From San Siro Stadium
programme.desc: One Direction concert from the 2014 "Where We Are" tour

programme.title: St. Vincent
programme.desc: A boy strikes up a friendship with his neighbour, a retired misbehaving curmudgeon

programme.title: Mistaken for Strangers
programme.desc: Matt Berninger, the front man of the indie-rock group the National, hires his slacker brother Tom as a roadie during a world tour. However, his sibling uses the opportunity to film a fascinating documentary about the band

programme.title: Spark: A Burning Man Story
programme.desc: A look at the annual art-and-music festival called Burning Man, which draws more than 60,000 people to the Nevada desert

programme.title: Cas & Dylan
programme.desc: Self-proclaimed loner Dr. Cas Pepper (Richard Dreyfuss) finds himself on the run with an aspiring young writer who hopes to help Cas overcome the writer's block that is preventing him from writing a proper suicide note. Along the way, the unlikely pair discover life has more to teach them both

programme.title: Maz Jobrani: I'm Not a Terrorist But I've Played One on TV
programme.desc: Comedian Maz Jobrani takes on sociopolitical issues and childrearing through the lens of his Iranian-American background

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: A paroled thief (John Travolta) gets sucked into an audacious heist scheme to steal a Monet painting by replacing it with a perfect duplicate

programme.title: Boulevard
programme.desc: When a middle-aged man stuck in a comfortable but dull life befriends a young gay hustler, he must come to terms with the secret that's been hovering beneath the surface of his marriage

programme.title: Perfect Sisters
programme.desc: This riveting true-crime thriller follows two teenage sisters as their drug-addled mother plans to move in with an abusive lover. In response, the pair decide to remedy their situation by plotting their mom's murder

programme.title: Inside Comedy
programme.desc: Key & Peele; Garry Marshall. Key and Peele; Garry Marshall

programme.title: Tiny Furniture
programme.desc: In this quirky comedy-drama, film-school grad Aura (Lena Dunham) returns home to help her mother and sister as her younger sibling prepares for college. She eventually develops a platonic relationship with a video artist and takes a job at a restaurant, where she becomes smitten with one of the cooks

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: A paroled thief (John Travolta) gets sucked into an audacious heist scheme to steal a Monet painting by replacing it with a perfect duplicate

programme.title: Boulevard
programme.desc: When a middle-aged man stuck in a comfortable but dull life befriends a young gay hustler, he must come to terms with the secret that's been hovering beneath the surface of his marriage

programme.desc: This riveting true-crime thriller follows two teenage sisters as their drug-addled mother plans to move in with an abusive lover. In response, the pair decide to remedy their situation by plotting their mom's murder

programme.title: Scar Tissue
programme.desc: A young man and a female cop hunt a serial killer who supposedly died years earlier(n)

programme.title: Patrick
programme.desc: In this shocking remake of the terrifying cult classic, a telekinetic coma patient is subjected to cruel medical experiments by a malevolent doctor. When the outwardly brain-dead patient lashes out, a nurse becomes the target of his supernatural wrath(n)

programme.title: The Mind of Mark Defriest
programme.desc: A profile of a talented jailbreak artist who is forced to spend time in the harshest penitentiary in Florida after a psychiatrist testified that he was faking mental illness for decades. The filmmakers explore how the legal and penal systems have treated this man(n)

programme.title: Maz Jobrani: I'm Not a Terrorist But I've Played One on TV
programme.desc: Comedian Maz Jobrani takes on sociopolitical issues and childrearing through the lens of his Iranian-American background(n)

programme.title: Greetings From Tim Buckley
programme.desc: Set in 1991, just three years before the release of Jeff Buckley's debut album Grace and six years before his untimely death at age 30, director Dan Algrant's Greetings From Tim Buckley follows the troubled young musician as he prepares to participate in a tribute concert for his late father while at the same time struggling to emerge from under his father's colossal shadow. As the concert at St. Ann's Church approaches, rising musician Tim (Penn Badgley) wrestles with the anger of being abandoned by his dad (who later died of a drug overdose), and starts to fall for a Allie (Imogen Poots), a pretty intern who's helping to organize the performance. Meanwhile, as Tim grapples with the complex emotions of feeling like an outsider and a guest of honor at the same time, glimpses of his father's rise and fall puts the young musician's life into a unique perspective(n)

programme.title: 21 Years: Richard Linklater
programme.desc: This affectionate profile of indie director Richard Linklater examines his life and creative process in an attempt to explain the mind-set that brought "Dazed and Confused," "Boyhood" and the "Before Sunrise" trilogy to the big screen(n)

programme.title: The Roost
programme.desc: Creatures of the night find new prey on the scariest night of the year in this horror story. It's Halloween night, and four friends -- Allison (Vanessa Horneff), Elliott (Wil Horneff), Trevor (Karl Jacob), and Brian (Sean Reid) -- are on a road trip en route to a friend's wedding when their car breaks down after running into something. Looking for help, the four happen upon the farmhouse of an elderly couple, Elvin (Richard Little) and May (Barbara Wilhide), which is located next to a huge barn. Elvin and May have already become lost in the darkness of the barn, and soon two of the lost travelers are suffering the same fate as they search for friendly strangers. However, while they can barely see a hand in front of their face, they discover they're not alone in the barn, which has become home to a huge swarm of bloodthirsty bats. The Roost is framed by an introduction and postscript from a television horror show host, played by Tom Noonan(n)

programme.title: Inside Comedy
programme.desc: Conan O'Brien; Jeffrey Tambor. Season 4 ends with Conan O'Brien and Jeffrey Tambor being interviewed(n)

programme.title: Big Significant Things
programme.desc: In this touching dramedy, a twentysomething man named Craig embarks on a road trip that could threaten his cross-country move with his girlfriend. Along the way, he visits some of the world's largest roadside attractions(n)

programme.title: A Glimpse Inside the Mind of Charles Swan III
programme.desc: Famed graphic designer Charles Swan III (Charlie Sheen) finds his life spiraling out of control after he is dumped by his gorgeous girlfriend and becomes lost in a world of delusion and fantasy in this satirical comedy from director Roman Coppola (CQ). Charles Swan III had everything a man could want the day Ivana (Katheryn Winnick) walked out on him, yet all of his money and fame do little to heal the pain of his broken heart. Fortunately for Charles, his loyal friends Kirby (Jason Schwartzman) and Saul (Bill Murray) and his sister Izzy (Patricia Arquette) are there to help him on the road to emotional recovery. Aubrey Plaza and Mary Elizabeth Winstead co-star(n)

programme.title: Common
programme.desc: A 17-year-old boy faces murder charges after a friend riding in his car stabs someone to death, due to a cop who uses the controversial joint-enterprise doctrine to try everyone possible for the crime(n)

programme.title: Greetings From Tim Buckley
programme.desc: Set in 1991, just three years before the release of Jeff Buckley's debut album Grace and six years before his untimely death at age 30, director Dan Algrant's Greetings From Tim Buckley follows the troubled young musician as he prepares to participate in a tribute concert for his late father while at the same time struggling to emerge from under his father's colossal shadow. programme.title: I Survived a Zombie Holocaust
programme.desc: On the first day of filming, zombies overrun a movie set(n)

programme.title: Lumberjack Man
programme.desc: A demonic lumberjack terrorizes the staff of a church camp as they prepare for spring break(n)

programme.title: A Glimpse Inside the Mind of Charles Swan III

programme.title: Ben Gleib: Neurotic Gangster
programme.desc: Satirical comedian Ben Gleib performs a stand-up routine in which he social media, singledom, vegetarians and everything in between

programme.title: The Nasty Show Hosted by Artie Lange
programme.desc: Artie Lange hosts a lineup of deranged comics in performances that are not for the faint of heart. Featured: Mike Wilmot; Mike Ward; Gina Yashere; Luenell; Jimmy Carr; and Gilbert Gottfried

programme.title: The Manchurian Candidate
programme.desc: Gulf War hero Raymond is running for vice president, backed by his ruthless mother. But Raymond's unit leader Ben suspects that the squad was brainwashed in the Gulf and that Raymond is a security threat

programme.title: Judgment Day
programme.desc: Cultists with an enigmatic leader seize the only man capable of devising a way to stop a giant meteor from hitting the Earth. A female agent teams up with a prisoner , who together have tree days to rescue the scientist and save the planet

programme.title: Big Eyes
programme.desc: The true story of painter Margaret Keane's life in obscurity while her husband gleaned the notoriety for being the face of her work is brought to the screen by Tim Burton and his Ed Wood screenwriters, Scott Alexander and Larry Karaszewski. The story opens in the late 1950s, when Margaret Keane (Amy Adams) packs up the car with her daughter and their personal belongings, and leaves her husband to start a new life in San Francisco. There, Margaret quickly reconnects with her old friend DeeAnn (Krysten Ritter), and falls head over heels for Walter (Christoph Waltz), an artist and part-time real-estate broker who soon shows great interest in her unique paintings of small children with strikingly expressive, saucer-like eyes. Before long, the two are married, and Walter is claiming credit for Margaret's increasingly popular paintings. With the money rolling in, Margaret initially agrees to go along with the ruse, but the closer she gets to her new husband the more she begins to realize that he's little more than a smooth-talking scam artist. Later, riddled with guild over the fact that she's been deceiving her own daughter as her paintings become a pop-culture phenomenon, Margaret leaves the increasingly abusive Walter, and moves to Hawaii. Only then does Margaret gain the confidence to reclaim the works that have been credited to her husband, even when doing so entails going before the judge and proving that she and she alone created the enchanting children with the big eyes. Danny Huston, Terence Stamp, and Jason Schwartzman co-star

programme.title: Paper Planes
programme.desc: A young boy living in a small country town dreams of making it to the World Paper Plane Championships in Japan despite having no funds to get there and a disapproving father

programme.title: Becoming Bulletproof
programme.desc: A group of disabled Americans take part in the production of a costume-drama Western movie

programme.title: Woman in Gold
programme.desc: A Jewish woman attempts to reclaim her family's property, which was stolen six decades earlier during WWII. With the help of an ambitious young lawyer, she starts legal proceedings in various countries around the world

programme.title: Punch-Drunk Love
programme.desc: Paul Thomas Anderson follows 1999's MAGNOLIA with the intensely compelling character study PUNCH-DRUNK LOVE. Barry Egan is a quiet, shy, socially awkward man with an office in an out-of-the-way warehouse. He is dedicated to his job as a wholesale toilet plunger salesman, he keeps a nice apartment, and he is obsessed with special offers on grocery store products..

programme.title: The Other End of the Line
programme.desc: Sparks fly between Jesse Metcalfe ("Desperate Housewives") and Bollywood star Shriya Saran in this bubbly comedy about an operator at an Indian call center who goes to San Francisco to meet a guy she falls for over the phone. Anupam Kher, Sara Foster, Austin Basis. Directed by James Dodson

programme.title: What If
programme.desc: A dropout med student falls for an aspiring animator, but finds that she is committed to her live-in boyfriend. They agree just to be friends, but gradually grow more intimate when her partner is away traveling

programme.title: Up in the Air
programme.desc: With a job that has him traveling around the country firing people, Ryan Bingham leads an empty life out of a suitcase, until his company does the unexpected: ground him

programme.title: Woman in Gold
programme.desc: A Jewish woman attempts to reclaim her family's property, which was stolen six decades earlier during WWII. With the help of an ambitious young lawyer, she starts legal proceedings in various countries around the world

Danny Huston, Terence Stamp, and Jason Schwartzman co-star

programme.title: Lucky Number Slevin
programme.desc: Paul McGuigan's tricksy thriller stars Josh Hartnett as Slevin Kelevra, who pitches up at his friend's New York apartment, only to find it empty. He makes himself at home, but his peace is interrupted by employees of crime lord The Boss, who mistake him for his absent friend, who owes The Boss $96,000. But The Boss makes Slevin an offer: kill the son of his rival, The Rabbi, and the debt will be wiped clean. But The Rabbi soon gets hold of Slevin and makes a counter-offer. Add in cynical assassin Mr Goodkat, who is playing both ends against the middle in what might be a long-term plan, and Lucy Liu as Lindsey, Slevin's next-door neighbour, who soon becomes his love interest, and the result is a multi-stranded double-cross, but one with only one lucky winner..(n)

programme.title: War
programme.desc: Jet Li and Jason Statham star in this fast paced action thriller, directed by Phillip G. Atwell. Statham plays an FBI agent determined to take down a mysterious assassin known as Rogue (Li), after his partner is murdered(n)

programme.title: Arachnophobia
programme.desc: Heart-stopping horror yarn in which a doctor, Ross Jennings, moves his family to a new town only to find his patients falling victim to the offspring of a deadly tropical variety of the very creature he loathes - the spider. Fear grips the doctor's heart when it dawns on him that the South American spiders causing the deaths are nesting in his barn, and it falls upon him to save the otherwise safe and placid small town(n)

programme.title: Lost Songs: The Basement Tapes Continued
programme.desc: Modern country and folk singers adapt the recently discovered "Basement Tapes", a collection of legendary Bob Dylan sessions, into new arrangements. Lead by T Bone Burnett, this extraordinary collection of musicians include Elvis Costello, Taylor Goldsmith, Jim James, and more(n)

programme.title: Arctic Tale
programme.desc: Documentary following the life cycle of a plucky newborn polar bear and a walrus cub(n)

programme.title: Meru
programme.desc: This documentary follows top climbers Conrad Anker, Jimmy Chin and Renan Ozturk as they tackle the Shark's Fin, a treacherous 20,000 ft. near vertical point on Mount Meru in India. The ascent took much longer than they anticipated and the group was faced with challenging situations that included sub-zero temperatures, losing a large portion of their food and resting in sleeping bags that dangled precariously from the mountain. The group persevered and became the first team to reach the summit in October 2008. The film also contains an interview with John Krakauer, author of "Into Thin Air" and candid interviews with the climbers and their families(n)

programme.title: Paddington
programme.desc: A little lost bear befriends a young boy at London's Paddington train station, in this live-action family film based on the children's book series by Michael Bond(n)

programme.title: The Drew
programme.desc: The story of the unlikely rise of the Drew League from humble beginnings in the crime and gang-infested streets of South Central Los Angeles to the nation's foremost pro-am basketball league. Featuring NBA stars Kevin Durant, DeMar DeRozan, Brandon Jennings and Baron Davis(n)

programme.title: Reservoir Dogs
programme.desc: A band of criminals are assembled for a jewel heist by a kingpin who keeps them anonymous from each other. But when the job goes wrong, the group is left bloodied and panicked, wondering who among them is the rat

programme.title: Spring Breakers
programme.desc: Four mischievous female university students fall under the spell of an eccentric drug dealer and get mixed up in a bloody turf war

programme.title: Drunk Stoned Brilliant Dead: The Story of the National Lampoon
programme.desc: Examining the founding and history of National Lampoon magazine, which published its first issue in April 1970. This documentary includes interviews with former Lampoon writers and editors

programme.title: Atari: Game Over
programme.desc: An exploration of the decline of video-game giant Atari and its secret burial of unsold "E.T." game cartridges in a New Mexico landfill

programme.title: Play It Forward
programme.desc: In this emotional documentary, Hall-of-Fame NFL tight-end Tony Gonzalez continues his dream to win a Super Bowl in his final professional season, while simultaneously supporting his brother (who's football career stalled due to injury) in a journey to become a firefighter. Andrea Nevins directs this heartfelt story, with former NFL-er Michael Strahan serving as an executive producer

programme.title: All Things Must Pass: The Rise and Fall of Tower Records
programme.desc: This entertaining documentary explores the rise and fall of Tower Records, a chain of music stores that went out of business after entering bankruptcy in 2004

programme.title: The Surface
programme.desc: Two strangers end up shipwrecked on Lake Michigan, both harboring secrets that put their lives in danger unless they find a way to work together

programme.title: Camp X-Ray
programme.desc: A small-town girl joins the military and becomes a guard at Guantanamo Bay, where she forges a delicate, transformative bond with an inmate who raises some compelling questions about his incarceration in this powerful drama

programme.title: No Escape
programme.desc: An American businessman relocates his family to Southeast Asia, but their lives are put in grave danger when they get caught up in a violent political uprising in this nail-biting thriller. As they attempt to reach the U.S. embassy, they are aided by a mysterious British tourist

programme.title: Pound of Flesh
programme.desc: A former black-ops agent has his kidney stolen by organ thieves the night before he planned to donate it to his dying niece. With the clock ticking and his niece clinging to life, he attempts to track down those responsible

programme.title: Dragon: The Bruce Lee Story
programme.desc: Biography of martial arts exponent Bruce Lee, who rose to superstardom while battling racism plus his own inner 'demon warrior'. The story follows his progress in the martial arts, through to his teaching in the 1960s. Bruce marries an American girl, has two children, and then is signed up to appear on TV and feature films. The hallucinations of the demon continue to follow him, however

programme.title: The Warrior's Way
programme.desc: A legendary Asian swordsman must fight for his life after giving up his warrior ways and hiding out in the American badlands in this Western-martial-arts hybrid

programme.title: Snowpiercer
programme.desc: A revolution brews on a train containing the last of humanity in this sci-fi film set during a new ice age. When the lower classes in the back cars decide to invade the upper classes in the front, the superpowered locomotive speeds toward tragedy

programme.title: No Escape
programme.desc: An American businessman relocates his family to Southeast Asia, but their lives are put in grave danger when they get caught up in a violent political uprising in this nail-biting thriller. As they attempt to reach the U.S. embassy, they are aided by a mysterious British tourist

programme.title: Dark Net
programme.desc: Provoke. A look at the world of Cyberbanging where inner city youth use social media to brag, conspire and incite violence. Also: two African-American women bloggers who turned the table on the trolls who threatened them; and the creator of Abdullah X, an online character who is trying to keep Muslim kids from falling under the spell of Islamic extremists(n)

programme.title: Penn & Teller: Bull!
programme.desc: Lawns. The guys tread on unfamiliar turf when they examine the lawn-care industry. Included: the case of a man who was sent to prison because of his unkempt property; a visit to a neighborhood where only a certain strain of grass is acceptable(n)

programme.title: The Talented Mr. Ripley
programme.desc: Matt Damon, Jude Law and Gwyneth Paltrow star in this chilling adaptation of Patricia Highsmith's novel about a social-climbing psychopath. Damon is superb as Tom Ripley, a charming mimic whose obsession with a wealthy playboy (Law) turns deadly. Cate Blanchett, Philip Seymour Hoffman. Directed by Anthony Minghella(n)

programme.title: Need for Speed

programme.title: Hidalgo
programme.desc: Viggo Mortensen ("Lord of the Rings") and his scrappy American mustang take on Arabian purebreds in this rousing saga. Mortensen plays legendary endurance rider Frank T. Hopkins, who takes his horse Hidalgo to Arabia to race against steeds owned by proud desert royalty(n)

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: Engineer Dev Patel reprograms a police droid so it can think and feel, but there are dangerous consequences. Sci-fi action with Hugh Jackman and Sigourney Weaver. (2015)(116 mins)(n)

programme.title: Southpaw
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal stars as troubled boxer Billy Hope in this high-stakes drama from director Antoine Fuqua and Sons of Anarachy creator Kurt Sutter. At the height of his fame and success, Hope is convinced by his loving wife Maureen (Rachel McAdams) to retire from the sport in order to spend more time with the couple's daughter Leila (Oona Laurence). On the night of his retirement announcement, a rival boxer calls out Hope and an altercation breaks out, killing Maureen. Hope's self-destructive behavior worsens, and Leila is taken away by child services. In order to redeem his life and get his daughter back, Hope must return to boxing under the tutelage of hardened trainer Titus "Tick" Willis (Forest Whitaker)(n)

programme.title: Need for Speed
programme.desc: A street racer who was framed for murder leaves prison and enters a high-stakes cross-country race looking for redemption and revenge(n)

programme.title: Ironclad
programme.desc: Vengeful King John lays siege to a castle manned by a ragtag group who are forced to make a desperate stand against the tyrant(n)

programme.title: The Usual Suspects
programme.desc: Near the end of The Usual Suspects, Kevin Spacey, in his Oscar-winning performance as crippled con man Roger "Verbal" Kint, says, "The greatest trick the Devil ever pulled was convincing the world he didn't exist." This may be the key line in this story; the farther along the movie goes, the more one realizes that not everything is quite what it seems, and what began as a conventional whodunit turns into something quite different. A massive explosion rips through a ship in a San Pedro, CA, harbor, leaving 27 men dead, the lone survivor horribly burned, and 91 million dollars' worth of cocaine, believed to be on board, mysteriously missing. Police detective Dave Kujan (Chazz Palminteri) soon brings in the only witness and key suspect, "Verbal" Kint. Kint's nickname stems from his inability to keep his mouth shut, and he recounts the events that led to the disaster. Five days earlier, a truckload of gun parts was hijacked in Queens, NY, and five men were brought in as suspects: Kint, hot-headed hipster thief McManus (Stephen Baldwin), ill-tempered thug Hockney (Kevin Pollak), flashy wise guy Fenster (Benicio Del Toro), and Keaton (Gabriel Byrne), a cop gone bad now trying to go straight in the restaurant business. While in stir, someone suggests that they should pull a job together, and Kint hatches a plan for a simple and lucrative jewel heist. Despite Keaton's misgivings, the five men pull off the robbery without a hitch and fly to Los Angeles to fence the loot. Their customer asks if they'd be interested in pulling a quick job while out West; the men agree, but the robbery goes horribly wrong and they soon find themselves visited by Kobayashi (Pete Postlethwaite), who represents a criminal mastermind named Keyser Soze. Soze's violent reputation is so infamous that he's said to have responded to a threat to murder his family by killing them himself, just to prove that he feared no one. When Kobayashi passes along a heist proposed by Soze that sounds like suicide, the men feel that they have little choice but to agree(n)

programme.title: Last Knights
programme.desc: In this action-packed medieval tale, a skilled warrior and his small clan fight back against an oppressive ruler in order to avenge the murder of their master(n)

programme.title: Black Snake Moan
programme.desc: A God-fearing bluesman takes to a wild young woman who, as a victim of childhood sexual abuse, looks everywhere for love, never quite finding it(n)

programme.title: Perfect Sisters
programme.desc: This riveting true-crime thriller follows two teenage sisters as their drug-addled mother plans to move in with an abusive lover. In response, the pair decide to remedy their situation by plotting their mom's murder(n)

programme.title: Revolutionary Road
programme.desc: Frank and April have a suburban life with a nice house, a manicured lawn and two kids. Frank loses his nerve after taking a comfortable job with a reliable salary, and April morphs into an unsatisfied homemaker desperate for passion and excitement. Soon they become a typical suburban family with abandoned dreams and faded hopes(n)

programme.title: Freedom
programme.desc: In 1856, a slave and his family escape from a plantation near Richmond via the Underground Railroad. A century earlier, the captain of a slave ship questions the morality of his mission(n)

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider
programme.desc: Action tale adapted from the popular video game in which the eponymous heroine races against time to find an ancient relic before it falls into the wrong hands. Leaving behind her life of luxury, the highly-trained adventurer travels to exotic and dangerous locales, where she battles a variety of fantastical creatures in the knowledge that the fate of mankind rests in her hands(n)

programme.title: Freedom Writers
programme.desc: Hilary Swank stars as Erin Gruwell in Richard lagravenese's gritty drama, based on a true-life story. Gruwell is a fresh-faced teacher at a tough inner city school in Long Beach, California, armed with lesson plans and reading lists. Finding her students more interested in recent gang shootings than poetry, she refuses to give up on them, teaching instead books and writings that relate to their lives. Imelda Staunton plays Margaret Campbell, her draconian head of department, with Patrick Dempsey as Erin's long suffering husband(n)

programme.title: Mistress
programme.desc: Satire about a filmmaker and three prospective backers, each with a girlfriend who has star potential(n)

programme.title: Match
programme.desc: Emotions run high in this moving drama about an aging Juilliard dance teacher who is confronted by his painful past during an interview with a grad student. Ultimately, the talk could lead to healing or despair for the interviewer's shattered husband(n)

programme.title: Duets
programme.desc: Several 'karaoke hustlers' travel across the USA competing in karaoke singing contests, all heading towards the big national championship in Omaha(n)

programme.title: The Boy Next Door
programme.desc: In this provocative thriller, a lonely, recently divorced teacher has an affair with a much-younger man. However, their relationship takes a terrifying turn as he grows obsessed with her(n)

programme.title: Real Time With Bill Maher
programme.desc: Republican consultant Frank Luntz and actor Viggo Mortensen are the interview guests. The panelists are writer Jelani Cobb, political commentator S.E. Cupp and former New York governor Eliot Spitzer(n)

programme.title: The Time Machine
programme.desc: The classic science fiction novel by H.G. Wells becomes this big-budget adventure directed by the author's great-grandson Simon Wells. Guy Pearce stars as Alexander Hartdegen, a scientist, professor, and inventor in 1895 New York City who believes that time travel is possible. The sudden and unexpected death of his fiancée spurs Alexander to build a time machine, which he hopes to use in an effort to change the past. When he is unable to change the past, Alexander hurls himself more than 800,000 years into the future, seeking answers about the nature of time, but instead encountering a dystopian world where humanity has divided up into two races, the peaceful Eloi and the subterranean Morlocks. Befriending the beautiful Eloi woman Mara (pop singer Samantha Mumba), Alexander must set out to save her from the underground world of the Morlocks when she is captured by them. Along the way, he is aided by Vox (Orlando Jones), a bio-mechanical being from the 21st century. Ultimately, Alexander makes a shocking discovery about the true nature of the Eloi and Morlocks and decides that the only way to change the future is to alter the present. Due to exhaustion, director Wells was briefly replaced during the last few weeks of production by Gore Verbinski, director of The Mexican (2001). The Time Machine co-stars Jeremy Irons and Mark Addy(n)

programme.title: Real Time With Bill Maher
programme.desc: Republican consultant Frank Luntz and actor Viggo Mortensen are the interview guests. The panelists are writer Jelani Cobb, political commentator S.E. Cupp and former New York governor Eliot Spitzer(n)

programme.title: Transformers
programme.desc: Michael Bay's all-action adventure, based on the popular toy. Earth becomes the battleground between the good Transformers and the bad who are searching for the all-powerful Allspark which could destroy humanity. Caught up in the middle is Sam Witwicky, whose beaten-up old car reveals itself to be an Autobot called Bumblebee. The duo hold the key to the battle which rages between the Decepticons and the government forces, led by Sgt Lennox but can they stop the evil Megatron(n)

programme.desc: Episode 4. Aaron Rodgers is the guest(n)

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen
programme.desc: Cinema icon Al Pacino joins a powerhouse cast headed by of George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia, Don Cheadle, Bernie Mac, and series newcomer Ellen Barkin for this, the third installment of director Steven Soderbergh's popular series of glitzy crime comedies. The only hotelier in Las Vegas who can claim that each and every one of his establishments has earned the Royal Review Board's Five Diamond Award, Willy Bank (Pacino) has made more than his share of enemies during his impressive ascent. While most of Bank's adversaries amount to little more than the occasional nuisance, however, this powerful player is about to find out that picking your enemies in Las Vegas can be a true gamble. In betraying Reuben Tishkoff (Elliott Gould), Bank has finally crossed the one man who could bring his entire empire crumbling to the ground -- Danny Ocean (Clooney). Now Reuben is in critical condition, and Ocean is determined to strike back at the man who nearly murdered his mentor. Bank may have taken down one of the original Ocean's Eleven, but his efforts only managed to unite the remaining ten closer than ever before. As the opening of Bank's newest casino draws near, Danny and the crew set into motion a bold plan to humiliate the cocksure casino owner and forever tarnish his spotless reputation. It won't be easy, but if Ocean and his team can get their elaborate plan together in time for the opening of The Bank, they just might be able to deliver some serious Las Vegas justice(n)

programme.title: The Night Of
programme.desc: The Beach. An eight-part drama series following a murder case in New York City. In the opener, a perfect night for a Pakistani-American student turns into a nightmare when he is arrested for murder(n)

programme.title: Jumper
programme.desc: Doug Liman's sci-fi thriller stars Hayden Christensen as David Rice, a 'jumper', who can teleport anywhere instantly. He uses his powers to accumulate the wealth for an ideal lifestyle, but finds himself threatened by the Paladins, a shadowy organisation led by Roland, who are dedicated to tracking down and killing jumpers. Rice teams up with fellow jumper Griffin (Jamie Bell to take on the Paladins and to save his sweetheart Millie (Rachel Billson, who has become an innocent pawn in the battle(n)

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: Twenty-two years after Jurassic Park opened on Isla Nubar, a dinosaur-themed resort attracts thousands of visitors each year, just as John Hammond envisioned. However, following a bad sag in turnout a new effort is undertaken to revitalize Jurassic World, but once again mankind's attempts to interfere with nature bring ominous results(n)

programme.title: Ted 2

programme.desc: Dark drama set in the Hollywood movie industry(n)

programme.title: Smokin' Aces
programme.desc: This explosive, energetic crime opus, set in a glitzy Lake Tahoe hotel, rides shotgun with a wild collection of assassins as they gun for lowlife magician Buddy "Aces" Israel (Jeremy Piven), who is turning state's evidence against the mob. Ben Affleck, Ray Liotta, Ryan Reynolds, Taraji Henson, Andy Garcia, Peter Berg. Wayne Newton has a cameo as himself. Singer Alicia Keys and rapper Common make their big-screen debuts. Written and directed by Joe Carnahan(n)

programme.title: Michigan vs. Ohio State: The Rivalry
programme.desc: For over a century, The Michigan Wolverines and the Ohio State Buckeyes have been doing battle on the college gridiron. This documentary traces the rich history of this storied rivalry, underlining the importance it plays to both schools, and profiles some the games' legendary figures including Woody Hayes and Bo Schembechler(n)

programme.title: Breach
programme.desc: Shattered Glass director Billy Ray directs Chris Cooper and Ryan Philippe in this fact-based drama concerning the FBI traitor who carried out what many historians refer to as the most notable national security breach in U.S. history. A key member of the FBI's elite Soviet Analytical Unit, Robert Hanssen (Chris Cooper) would, for 15 years beginning in 1985, sell thousands of pages of classified documents to the Soviets. After making roughly 600,000 dollars on his clandestine endeavor and compromising everything from the identities of KGB spies working for the American government to nuclear war contingency plans, Hanssen was eventually transferred to a newly created position at the FBI's Washington headquarters and assigned the task of guarding his country's most sensitive secrets. It was while working in this capacity that a young agent named Eric O'Neill (Phillipe) was assigned the task of keeping tabs on Hanssen by suspicious higher-ups. Later, after being arrested while delivering a cache of secret documents to a "dead drop" spot in a Virginia park, the notorious traitor was arrested and sentenced to life in prison with no chance for parole(n)

programme.title: The Divergent Series: Insurgent
programme.desc: Directed by Robert Schwentke, the second film in the Divergent series find Tris (Shailene Woodley) and Four (Theo James) on the run from Jeanine Matthews (Kate Winslet) while trying to figure out the secret that will help the rebels build a new and better future(n)

programme.title: Real Sports With Bryant Gumbel
programme.desc: Segments include a one-on-one interview with Arizona Cardinals head coach Bruce Arians; a report on mental competitions for youth in the U.S.; and another visit with long-lost sisters Dominique Moceanu and Jen Bricker(n)

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: After an exploratory mission goes awry, lone astronaut Mark Watney (Matt Damon) is left for dead on the hostile surface of Mars and must use his scientific ingenuity to homestead an enclosed habitat where he can survive. Meanwhile, the astronauts he left behind realize the severity of his plight and join forces with an international coalition of scientists to launch a rescue mission in defiance of NASA protocol(n)

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Pilot. programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Raise Up. Spencer clashes with Reggie when he tries to sign Vernon as a client, while Jason works on a contract extension with Dallas. Elsewhere, Charles begins to wonder if he retired too early; and Ricky fails to connect with a new teammate(n)

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Move the Chains. Spencer and Joe borrow a yacht for a lavish party to woo new clients, but Reggie relishes spoiling Spencer's hospitality every chance he gets, while Ricky discovers the real reason a new teammate isn't too fond of him(n)

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Heads Will Roll. Spencer sees a neurologist when Tracy threatens to go public with an unsavory story. Meanwhile, Reggie blindsides Jason and Spencer with unrealistic expectations for Vernon's contract; and Charles is flummoxed by texts from a woman he can't remember(n)

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Machete Charge. Ricky tries to find common ground with Alonzo; Charles' marriage is put to the test; Vernon gets help from Spencer and Joe with a crisis(n)

programme.desc: Ends. Ricky flies off the handle; Spencer and Charles say good-bye to Roddney; Jason meets his mother's new beau(n)

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Gaslighting. Spencer tries to save Vernon by confronting his past; Ricky tries to reconcile with Bella; Charles finds that his football skills come in handy(n)

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Head-On. Joe feels slighted when his efforts at work go unnoticed; Spencer tries to make amends; Bella challenges Ricky to act like an adult; Vernon is nowhere to be found after discovering what Reggie's been up to(n)

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Flamingos. In the Season 1 finale, Spencer faces a tough decision when Joe has an idea for a new venture; Ricky is confronted by his dad; Charles gets another chance; and Jason and Spencer try to get through to Vernon once and for all(n)

programme.title: Magic Mike XXL
programme.desc: Retired male stripper Magic Mike (Channing Tatum) decides to help his friends put on one last show, as the crew embark on a road trip to Myrtle Beach to perform at an exotic-dance convention. Along the way, they brighten the lives of several women, including an aspiring photographer (Amber Heard) and a diva (Jada Pinkett Smith) from Mike's past(n)

programme.title: Everest
programme.desc: In this adventure docudrama set in 1996, several groups of climbers successfully scale Mount Everest, only to be faced with tragedy when a monster snowstorm surprises them as they attempt to make their descent(n)

programme.title: Magic Mike
programme.desc: Channing Tatum and Alex Pettyfer star in Steven Soderbergh's drama about male strippers in Florida. Drawing partly on his own real-life experiences of stripping when he was a teen, Tatum plays the movie's eponymous central character. Mike is in his 30s and has for some time earned his living by disrobing for the cash-paying audiences who frequent the Xquisite All-Male Revue. However, he's given reason to reassess the way his life is going when a new young recruit, Adam, joins the team. The enthusiasm with which Adam embraces his new lifestyle only serves to sharpen Mike's awareness of its shallowness; and then there's Adam's sister Brooke, who Mike begins to fall in love with..

programme.title: The Brothers

programme.title: Strictly Business
programme.desc: Sharp comedy about Bobby, a mail boy in a large firm who is promised a better job by his friend, but there's one condition, only if Bobby will help him get a date with Halle Berry!

programme.title: Wimbledon
programme.desc: Drama follows the plight of aspiring tennis-star Peter Colt, whose bad luck seems to manifest itself just about everywhere. Professionally, Peter is near the very bottom of the world tennis ranks, and personally, he can't find love despite his best efforts to do so. In a rare turn of events, however, Peter is chosen as a wildcard to play at Wimbledon, the tennis world's most prestigious competition. While there, he meets American Lizzie Bradbury, the "bad girl of tennis", and his confidence on and off the court improves tenfold as he falls in love with her. Driven by his newfound luck, Peter climbs to the top of the tournament at record speed, until he actually has a chance of winning the men's singles title. Will his good fortune hold out long enough for him to get the trophy?
